data.message: Help I don't speak spanish and my facebook is in spanish. How do I get English back?

replies.message: Hey Louise. You can find step by step instructions on how to change your language settings here: http://bit.ly/1SfyvgN. Thanks. -Jordan
Louise Goldman Facebook But when I did it is in Spanish and I have no idea what any of it says. I am at witts end. I want English...who the hell made it Spanish?
Louise Goldman me too!!! Not a happy campler
I speak spanish, where r u using it. App or website?
Hi Louise, please see my screenshots on how to change the language from Spanish. https://www.facebook.com/media/set/?set=a.1014162032006047.1073741875.100002367786053&type=1&l=d1a660b3c8

Angela Miller Hi Angela, please see my screenshots on how to change the language from Spanish. https://www.facebook.com/media/set/?set=a.1014162032006047.1073741875.100002367786053&type=1&l=d1a660b3c8
I did not do anything and it returned to english after a week or so.
